title: Own Less & Do More: All Inclusive Suite Living!
posting_body: We are currently leasing a smoke and pet free private suite with shared common area kitchen, bathroom and washer/dryer set.
You’ll love the convenience of simply unpacking your suitcases without the hassle of setting up utilities and moving furniture!
The common areas include complimentary weekly cleaning and supply re-stock.
Your suite is private with a smart-lock system, smart TV, closet, European-style refrigerator and dry bar area and private balcony in select units.
Use the onsite gym, sauna, roof top lounge with inspiring city views and conference room.
For your convenience, there is an online rent payment option and both management and maintenance are responsive and professional.
We are located off of the prestigious Wilshire Corridor just minutes from Westwood Village, the UCLA campus, UCLA Medical Center, Bel Air, Brentwood, West Los Angeles, Beverly Hills and Century City.
Contact for an appointment to visit and be sure to ask about our flexible lease options from one month to one year.
DISCLAIMER: Advertised rent is based on a 12-month lease term.
Pricing & availability are subject to change.
Pictures featured may not be of exact unit or furniture.
